original_text: And the water was spent in the bottle, and she cast the child under one of the shrubs.
korean_text: 가죽부대의 물이 떨어진지라 그 자식을 관목덤불 아래에 두고

sentences.original_text: And the water was spent in the bottle
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 물이 가죽 부대에서 다 떨어졌고

sentences.original_text: and she cast the child under one of the shrubs
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 아이를 수풀 하나 아래에 던졌다
